description:
Oichi, who married into the Azai family, welcomed her second child, so Nobunaga has Chidori go and visit her. Meanwhile, Nobunaga was talking to his ally, Tokugawa Ieyasu on what their next step would be. However, their next plan battle had an ulterior motive...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It Feels Like Something`s About to Start
